Class Club

  • java.lang.Object
    • Club

  • public class Club
extends java.lang.Object
    The Club class stores and retreives information about all the climbers in the club. It features methods to return the climber with the highest average height climbed, the highest mountain recorded across the climbers and a list of all mountains over a given height.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Thomas Harwin

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addClimber(Climber climber)
      Method for adding a climber to the club.
      java.util.ArrayList<Climber> getClubClimbers()
      Method for returning a list of climbers in the club.
      Mountain getHighestMountainInClub()
      A method which returns the highest mountain recorded across all members of the club.
      Climber getHighestRecordedAvgClimber()
      A method which returns the climber who has recorded the highest average mountain height within the club.
      java.util.ArrayList<Mountain> getMountainsGreaterThanInClub(int height)
      A method which returns a list of all mountains recorded by the climbers within a club which have a height greater than a given level.
